title: HAC Error Response
description: The HTTP Agent Context (HAC) error response envelope provides structured error information with optional recovery guidance for AI agents.

HacError.description: Structured error with optional recovery guidance.

code.description: A machine-readable error code. SHOULD be a stable identifier suitable for programmatic matching.

message.description: A human- and LLM-readable error message describing what went wrong.
examples: Cannot delete user with active subscriptions

retryable.description: Whether the agent MAY retry the same request and expect a different outcome (e.g., after a transient failure).

retry_after.description: Suggested number of seconds to wait before retrying, if retryable is true.

Recovery.description: Structured recovery guidance that tells the agent how to resolve the error.

description.description: An LLM-optimized description of the recovery steps the agent should take.

actions.description: Concrete actions the agent can take to recover from the error.
